precondition: The Windows XP desktop is visible.
The Windows XP desktop is visible.
expected_results: The 'Control Panel' window will open and come into focus.

precondition: The Windows XP desktop is visible.
expected_results: The Windows XP Start Menu will open on the left side of the screen.

precondition: The Windows XP Start Menu is open with the mouse cursor hovering over the "Control Panel" option.
expected_results: The "Control Panel" option in the Start Menu will become highlighted.

precondition: The Windows XP Control Panel is displayed in Classic View.
expected_results: The horizontal focus will move one icon to the right.

precondition: The Windows XP Start Menu is open.
expected_results: The 'Control Panel' item on the Windows taskbar will become highlighted.

precondition: The Control Panel is open in Classic View. The "Add or Remove Programs" icon is highlighted.
action: Press the 'P' key, followed by the 'O' key.
expected_results: The "Add or Remove Programs" icon will be de-selected, and the mouse cursor will move to the "Power Options" icon.

precondition: The "Power Options" icon in the Control Panel is selected.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will open.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is selected. The "Turn off monitor" dropdown menu should be visible.
action: Click the "Turn off monitor" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Turn off monitor" dropdown menu will expand, displaying a list of time options.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' dialog box is open, and the 'Turn off monitor' dropdown menu is open within the 'Home/Office Desk' power scheme settings.
action: Click the 'Never' option in the 'Turn off monitor' dropdown menu.
expected_results: The 'Turn off monitor' dropdown menu will close. The selected option will be 'Never'.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open. The "Home/Office Desk" power scheme is selected.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will close. The selected power scheme settings will be applied.

precondition: The "Control Panel" window is open and displaying the Classic View.
expected_results: The "Control Panel" window will be replaced by the "Display Properties" window.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is selected.
expected_results: The "Appearance" tab of the "Display Properties" window will be displayed.

precondition: The 'Screen Saver' tab of the 'Display Properties' window is open. The 'Screen saver' dropdown menu is visible.
expected_results: A list of available screen savers will appear.

precondition: The 'Screen Saver' tab of the 'Display Properties' window is open. A dropdown menu labeled 'Screen Saver' is open, displaying a list of available screen savers.
action: Click the 'None' option in the 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu.
expected_results: The dropdown menu will close, and 'None' will be displayed as the selected screen saver.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is active.
The Windows XP Control Panel is open and in "Classic View".
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will open.
